alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 8:47PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN BAYFIELD AND SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM CDT... At 846 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hawthorne, to near Solon Springs, to near Wascott, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lake Nebagamon and Poplar around 900 PM CDT. Maple around 905 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Brule, Iron River, Barnes and Oulu. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern Wisconsin.
